description:
Hydra Ichi has caught up to the bronze saints after their battle at Yuna’s hometown.   He is there to help him but something doesn’t seem right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les crocs venimeux. Piège au deuxième vestige !
Semaru Dokuga! Inbou Uzumaku Daini no Iseki!
The Poisonous Fangs Approach! The Second Ruins Surrounded by Intrigue!
迫る毒牙! 陰謀うずまく第二の遺跡!
